DOC.brief_title: Multiple Oral Dose Study Evaluate Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics PF-04878691
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 1855 , inclusive . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 1830 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50kg ( 110lbs ) . Pregnant nursing female . Females childbearing potential . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic autoimmune disease clinical finding screen . Smoking within previous 6 month .
DOC.keyword: Multiple oral dose escalation study PF-04878691
